name: beep
description: Beep is an offline data transformation tool, heavily influenced by the Mac tool [Boop](https://boop.okat.best).

scripts.build:all: concurrently "npm run build:base" "npm run build:core" "npm run build:gui" "npm run build:plugins"
scripts.build:gui: echo "GUI doesn't need to be built. Running or packaging the GUI will build it."
scripts.start:gui: npm run build:all && cd Gui && npm run electron
